hero.title: Project APIs
hero.description: Documentation of all internal endpoints with parameters, responses, rate limiting and security.

overview.title: How the APIs work
overview.description: All APIs are Next.js Route Handlers located in src/app/api/. They run on the server and are protected by rate limiting.

rateLimit.title: Rate Limiting
rateLimit.description: Each endpoint has limits per IP with configurable time window.

caching.title: Smart Cache
caching.description: In-memory cache with TTL + Cache-Control headers for CDN.

validation.title: Zod Validation
validation.description: Typed schemas validate body, query params and headers.

errorHandling.title: Error Handling
errorHandling.description: Consistent responses with appropriate status codes and clear messages.

endpoints.title: Available routes
endpoints.description: All API endpoints with usage details.

chat.title: AI Chat
chat.description: AI chatbot using OpenAI GPT-4 with response streaming.

codeReview.title: Code Review
codeReview.description: AI code analysis ‚Äî identifies bugs, suggests improvements and best practices.
codeReview.response: JSON with analysis, score and suggestions

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Email sending via Resend with reCAPTCHA validation.

github.title: GitHub Stats
github.description: GitHub profile statistics ‚Äî repos, stars, followers, languages.
github.response: JSON with profile data and repositories

contributors.title: Contributors
contributors.description: Repository contributors list with avatar and contribution count.
contributors.response: JSON array with login, avatarUrl, profileUrl, contributions

reactions.title: Reactions
reactions.description: Per-page reactions (‚ù§Ô∏è üî• üí°). GET returns counts and the user vote; POST adds, removes (toggle), or swaps the vote with IP+path deduplication over 24h.

online.title: Online Counter
online.description: Tracks and returns active visitors in the last 5 minutes using a Redis Sorted Set scored by Unix timestamp.

security.title: Implemented protections
security.description: Security layers that protect the APIs against abuse.

rateLimit.title: Rate Limiting by IP
rateLimit.description: Sliding window with count per IP. Returns 429 Too Many Requests when limit is exceeded.

recaptcha.title: Google reCAPTCHA v3
recaptcha.description: Validation on the contact endpoint to block bots and automated spam.

validation.title: Input Validation
validation.description: Zod schemas validate all inputs before processing. Invalid data receives 400 Bad Request.

headers.title: Security Headers
headers.description: Cache-Control, CORS and security headers configured in Next.js middleware.

envVars.title: Environment Variables
envVars.description: API keys (OpenAI, Resend, reCAPTCHA) stored in environment variables, never exposed to the client.
